capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Ability to conduct reviews, assessments, and evaluations on biodiversity conservation matters, indicating advanced problem-solving skills.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Providing independent advice to the Minister and conducting evaluations requires a high level of accountability and adherence to legislation.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Must effectively communicate complex biodiversity conservation issues and advice to the Minister and Environment Agency Head.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Ability to advise and influence decision-making processes on biodiversity conservation at a high level.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Acknowledgement of Aboriginal custodial responsibilities and commitment to partnerships indicates valuing diversity.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Panel members must collaborate with various stakeholders, including government officials and community groups, to provide comprehensive advice.

skills.name: Technical Knowledge in Biodiversity Conservation
skills.description: Expertise in biodiversity conservation, sustainable development, and related fields to provide informed advice.

skills.name: Legislative and Policy Analysis
skills.description: Ability to analyze and interpret legislation and policy documents related to biodiversity conservation.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with and influencing stakeholders, including government officials and the community, on biodiversity conservation issues.

generalRole.title: Biodiversity Conservation Advisor
generalRole.description: This role involves providing expert advice on biodiversity conservation, influencing policy and legislation, and ensuring sustainable management of natural resources. It requires advanced problem-solving, accountability, and effective communication skills.
